1.name: The Shawshank Redemption
1.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

2.name: Pulp Fiction
2.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

3.name: Forrest Gump
3.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

4.name: Léon
4.description: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

5.name: The Lion King
5.description: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

6.name: Disclosure
6.description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

7.name: The Mask
7.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

8.name: The Crow
8.description: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

9.name: Legends of the Fall
9.description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

10.name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
10.description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

11.name: Black Beauty
11.description: The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

12.name: Natural Born Killers
12.description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

13.name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
13.description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

14.name: Street Fighter
14.description: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

15.name: True Lies
15.description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

16.name: Stargate
16.description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

17.name: The Flintstones
17.description: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

18.name: Muriel's Wedding
18.description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

19.name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
19.description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

20.name: Dumb and Dumber
20.description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen, to return the briefcase to its owner.

21.name: Clerks
21.description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

22.name: Little Women
22.description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

23.name: Speed
23.description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

24.name: The Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre
24.description: A group of teenagers get into a car crash in the Texas woods on prom night, and then wander into an old farmhouse that is home to Leatherface and his insane family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

25.name: Nobody's Fool
25.description: A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.

26.name: The Little Rascals
26.description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

27.name: Ed Wood
27.description: Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

28.name: Frankenstein
28.description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

29.name: In the Mouth of Madness
29.description: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

30.name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
30.description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

31.name: Reality Bites
31.description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Gen X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

32.name: Beverly Hills Cop III
32.description: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

33.name: Little Giants
33.description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

34.name: Wes Craven's New Nightmare
34.description: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

35.name: The River Wild
35.description: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

36.name: Clear and Present Danger
36.description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

37.name: Little Odessa
37.description: Early 1990s drama about a family of Soviet Jews living in Brooklyn's Brighton Beach ocean-side neighborhood nicknamed Little Odessa.

38.name: Airheads
38.description: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head D.J. refuses to play them.

39.name: L'uomo che guarda
39.description: A troubled college professor becomes obsessed with the idea that his emotionally distant wife is having an affair with his invalid father.

40.name: Color of Night
40.description: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

41.name: The Jungle Book
41.description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wolves, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

42.name: Chung Hing sam lam
42.description: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

43.name: Heavenly Creatures
43.description: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

44.name: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
44.description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

45.name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
45.description: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

46.name: Tammy and the T-Rex
46.description: An evil scientist implants the brain of Michael, a murdered high school student, into a Tyrannosaurus. He escapes, wreaks vengeance on his high school tormentors, and is reunited with his sweetheart Tammy.

47.name: Angels in the Outfield
47.description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

48.name: Star Trek: Generations
48.description: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

49.name: Wolf
49.description: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

50.name: The Client
50.description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.
